  physical_appearance: This is a piece of patola textile. It features a diamond pattern
 intersected with rosettes. It is red

  sgcool_label_text: A fine example of a Bohra Gajji Bhat weave of Gujarati Patola. The Bohra Gajji is characterised by its diamond pattern
 intersected with rosettes. This weave of patola is associated with the Bohra Muslim communities of Gujarat

metadata.sgcool_label_text: A fine example of a Bohra Gajji Bhat weave of Gujarati Patola. The Bohra Gajji is characterised by its diamond pattern, intersected with rosettes. This weave of patola is associated with the Bohra Muslim communities of Gujarat
